pr_title: Support caching all tables in file status cache

timeline.bodyText: Encapsulate Set<SchemaTableName> tables and boolean cacheAllTables into a private inner class to prevent cases where tables is non-empty and cacheAllTables = true
timeline.author: highker
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -55,11 +56,13 @@ public CachingDirectoryLister(@ForCachingDirectoryLister DirectoryLister delegat
                 hiveClientConfig.getFileStatusCacheExpireAfterWrite(),
                 hiveClientConfig.getFileStatusCacheMaxSize(),
                 hiveClientConfig.getFileStatusCacheTables().stream()
+                        .filter(table -> !table.equals("*"))
                         .map(CachingDirectoryLister::parseTableName)
-                        .collect(Collectors.toSet()));
+                        .collect(Collectors.toSet()),
+                hiveClientConfig.getFileStatusCacheTables().contains("*"));
     }
 
-    public CachingDirectoryLister(DirectoryLister delegate, Duration expireAfterWrite, long maxSize, Set<SchemaTableName> tables)
+    public CachingDirectoryLister(DirectoryLister delegate, Duration expireAfterWrite, long maxSize, Set<SchemaTableName> tables, boolean cacheAllTables)

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/presto-hive/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/hive/CachingDirectoryLister.java b/presto-hive/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/hive/CachingDirectoryLister.java
index f8a313fb5b..415ac1713f 100644
--- a/presto-hive/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/hive/CachingDirectoryLister.java
+++ b/presto-hive/src/main/java/com/facebook/presto/hive/CachingDirectoryLister.java

@@ -55,14 +54,10 @@ public class CachingDirectoryLister
                 delegate,
                 hiveClientConfig.getFileStatusCacheExpireAfterWrite(),
                 hiveClientConfig.getFileStatusCacheMaxSize(),
-                hiveClientConfig.getFileStatusCacheTables().stream()
-                        .filter(table -> !table.equals("*"))
-                        .map(CachingDirectoryLister::parseTableName)
-                        .collect(Collectors.toSet()),
-                hiveClientConfig.getFileStatusCacheTables().contains("*"));
+                hiveClientConfig.getFileStatusCacheTables());
     }
 
-    public CachingDirectoryLister(DirectoryLister delegate, Duration expireAfterWrite, long maxSize, Set<SchemaTableName> tables, boolean cacheAllTables)
+    public CachingDirectoryLister(DirectoryLister delegate, Duration expireAfterWrite, long maxSize, List<String> cachedTables)
     {
         this.delegate = requireNonNull(delegate, "delegate is null");
         cache = CacheBuilder.newBuilder()

timeline.bodyText:
s/this.cacheAllTables/cacheAllTables/g
I think we prefer not to use this to reference variables
